channel.title: Server/client
channel.description:
first off, i would like to say, im sorry but i have no idear where i can post this so im posting it here.
i am coding a server, like most people here and iv coded others but im tired of having 3 CMDS up, run.bat for server, and both client ones.
im just wondering, what is a easier way because i have way to much on the bottom and its hard work.
anyone know a idear or what they do thats easier since i also have msn chats etc.

item.title: Server/client
item.dc:creator: @GrimReapersScythe GrimReapersScythe
item.description:
@GrimReapersScythe wrote:

Or, have one command prompt load both the client, and server. Such as,

@echo off
title Loading..
java -Xmx512m -cp .;Theme.jar .\CLIENTDIRECTORY\Gui
java -Xmx512m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.08-ga-bin.jar .\SERVERDIRECTORY\server

Read full topic

item.title: Server/client
item.dc:creator: @lesterknome lesterknome
item.description:
@lesterknome wrote:

open your run.bat and change the java to javaw

Downside: You need to exit server from Task Manager, not clients though

Read full topic
